official_title: A Feasibility Trial of LHRH Agonist Discontinuation in Elderly Prostate Cancer Patients
inclusion_criteria:
* Prostate cancer with >3 years of LHRH agonist therapy.
* Age ≥70 years.
* ECOG performance status ≤2
* Baseline testosterone of < 20 ng/ml
* No prior chemotherapy or Lu-PSMA (unless survival predictions are favorable).
* Ability to understand and sign informed consent.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 70 Years
